import React from "react"; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import PropTypes from "prop-types"; const Keypad = (props) => { const handleOnNumber = (e) => { props.onNumber(e.targetValue); }; return (
) } Keypad.propTypes = { onNumber: PropTypes.func, onClearEvery: PropTypes.func, onAdd: PropTypes.func, onEquals: PropTypes.func, onDecimal: PropTypes.func, onSubtract: PropTypes.func, onDivide: PropTypes.func, onMultiply: PropTypes.func, onPlusMinus: PropTypes.func }; export default Keypad;
